tweet.text: 🚨 FINAL CALL 🚨 Applications for the Presidential Management Fellows Program close TODAY. If you want to work with @HistoryAtState on the #FRUS series, submit your #PMF application by NOON (Eastern Time): https://t.co/9MdLicfclR https://t.co/hiqcwBg3NP
